sources.title: L'antique Tolède
sources.description: A compilation of views of Toledo showing bridges, walls and other architectural highlights that appear to date from as early as the 8th century by Segundo de Chomón.

metadata.Plot: A series of images from one of Spain's oldest cities and now part of UNESCO's World Heritage, the great Toledo. Segundo de Chomón's short film explores the place's old constructions, bridges, magnificent walls and other important monuments, most of them dating back from several centuries ago.
